full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP): Duct Cleaning and Inspections

#### Background
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of duct cleaning and inspections services at the Connaught Range and Primary Training Centre, located in Ottawa, ON.

#### Key Dates

*   RFP publication date: June 23, 2023
*   Amendment date: August 3, 2023
*   Tender closing date: Originally scheduled for August 15, 2023 at 14:00; however, due to an amendment, the bid submission must be submitted by July 27, 2023 at 14:00 EDT.
*   Expected contract start date: April 1, 2024
*   Expected contract end date: August 31, 2028

#### Necessity
This RFP requires a contractor to provide duct cleaning and inspections services, including all necessary tools, materials, travel, and labor on equipment in accordance with the Statement of Work.

#### Requirements
In addition to the aforementioned services, the selected contractor must meet the following requirements:

*   Security requirements associated with this requirement
*   Mandatory site visit on July 13th, 2023 at 10:00 AM EDT, accompanied by a facility escort.

#### Eligibility
All bids must be submitted by July 27, 2023 at 14:00 EDT to be considered. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

For more details, including bidding instructions, please refer to the Ariba Discovery posting response and CanadaBuys posting.

Registration information and a published notice URL are also available on the Ariba Discovery platform.

**Replying to this Notice:**\
Menus archives can be used to reply to this notice. Bidders that cannot reply via the menus archives can contact an Enquiries Officer PCSes for assistance. To be considered by this Government of Canada buy, interested providers shall respond via the menus archives. 

For more detailed information, including purchasing activity and critical language for all languages wording you may also wish to visit the Government Procurement page.
